reviews.review: Uma excelente escolha de jogo, podendo ser desafiador em certos momentos, porém com a satisfação de quando resolve se os puzzles quem estão presentes no jogo todo, com certeza um jogo sem igual.

O Jogo tem uma jogabilidade genial (Uma das melhores que eu já vi), uma história que infelizmente não foi demonstrada de uma forma muito profunda, os gráficos são ótimos tendo uma placa de vídeo boa ou ruim (Isso por experiencia própria). Por mais que pareça o jogo não precisa de um intelecto enorme ou mais de 1000 de QI pra jogar, a unica coisa que é preciso é tempo, talvez algumas horas de tentativa, até você entender e passar de fase. Mesmo sendo poucas, as vozes no jogo que escolheram para as gravações, GLaDos, Wheatley e até os Turrets foram muito boas, eu jogaria o jogo denovo e denovo até cansar, foi um dos melhores jogos que já joguei, recomendo, e muito.
It could strain your brainpower, but I definitely recommend this game. Truly a masterpiece.

Outstanding game. I've replayed it several times. Fun, challenging, imaginative, and also funny. J.K. Simmons, Ellen McLain, and Stephen Merchant are all fantastic and the characters are as well. 10/10. Owned it since launch day. Idk why it says I only logged 9.4 hours. I've played it since 2011, maybe its because I'm playing it on a new PC since then.

I got this game during the steam winter sale and I do not regret anything about thus purchase! The game takes brain power  and the co op is supper fun! I would say play with a friend because it is a great time!

TL;DR Portal is a great pickup-and-play puzzle game with fun dialogue and sweet lore. 9/10

Portal was full of amazing puzzles that give you a game that you can stop and play though a few rooms, and I think Portal 2 built on all aspects of game play greatly! The short but sweet nature of each puzzle allows more casual players to play in short bites of 10-20 minutes. Not only did it refine the portal mechanics to truly feel great, but the story is amazing, allowing more active players to play the game for long stretches of time without feeling bored. The dialogue of the characters is great and funny, and it brings a lot to look forward to after a puzzle. My only grievance is that the controls can feel kinda unfair and unpredictable at times, but that was expected for a physics-based puzzle game. Even 9 years later, Portal 2 is still a great game for its price, and I recommend it to anyone looking for a fun puzzle game!

[h1]这 是 旷 世 神 作 [/h1]

[b] 以下有剧透[/b]

当你觉得这一些结束了，终于再次打败了那个反派傲娇机器人，其实这才是开始。一直帮助你的人工智能[strike] （人工智障）[/strike] 机器人却成为了大反派，一心想要做测试不断撒谎杀死你的G姐变成了一颗土豆[strike] （育碧服务器）[/strike] ，这一刻开始她终于开始说实话了，只有 1.1V电压的土豆不够她来骗你。哦，她又开始撒谎了[strike] （Caroline已删除）[/strike] 

P.S. 我永远喜欢G姐
P.P.S. 土豆G姐yyds[strike] （鸟！鸟！杀了那个恶魔！啊，飞走了，算它走运）[/strike] 
P.P.P.S.双人模式也有剧情哦，主角是单人模式最后的那两个机器人，迷题难度比单人更大，有机会的话请务必不要错过
